Kyra.name: Kyra
Kyra.desc: A young girl aspiring to be the greatest warrior alive, she's fast and capable of using any sort of weaponry including swords and magic. However, she can barely take a hit, making her a Glass Cannon made for the sole purpose of sweeping enemies.

DEF- 2
